actions.text: Motion to table amendment SA 715 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 43. Record Vote Number: 186.
Amendment SA 715 proposed by Senator Feinstein. (consideration:  CR S6663-6690) To strike the repeal of the prohibition on research and development of low-yield nuclear weapons.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 715 proposed by Senator Feinstein.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 715 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 43. Record Vote Number: 186.

purpose: To strike the repeal of the prohibition on research and development of low-yield nuclear weapons.
